In 19 64, he represented the NAEB at the International Conference on Schools
Broadcasting in Tokyo, and served as a vice president of the conference. Subsequently,
Mr. Harley served as a member of the American delegation to a conference with
Japanese broadcasters which established a U.S.-Japan Educational Television
Program Exchange Center.
Mr. Harley regularly represents NAEB at meetings of the European Broadcasting
Union# of which NAEB is an Associate member.
October 1965
